title: Postgame fight mars Chiefs' win against Lions
content: A long, frustrating night for the Lions ended with safety Brian Branch delivering an open-handed strike to Chiefs wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster, setting off a brief fight among players from both teams.

title: Miller sets tone for 'resilient' Mariners in G1 win
content: The Mariners returned to the ALCS for the first time in 24 years Sunday, toppling the Blue Jays 3-1 in Game 1 behind Bryce Miller's six-inning gem on short rest, Cal Raleigh's game-tying home run and more timely hitting from Jorge Polanco.

title: Tua calls out some Fins for meeting attendance
content: Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa said Sunday that some of his teammates are showing up late or not at all to player-led meetings.

title: 49ers lose top LB Warner to season-ending injury
content: The San Francisco 49ers took another significant injury hit Sunday when linebacker Fred Warner departed in the first quarter because of a season-ending dislocated and fractured right ankle.

title: Unbuckled: Dowdle backs up talk, rolls Cowboys
content: Ex-Cowboys RB Rico Dowdle backed up his trash talk against his former team, racking up a Panthers-record 239 scrimmage yards in a 30-27 victory.

title: L.A. to start Snell in Game 1, Ohtani later in NLCS
content: The Dodgers will start Blake Snell in Game 1 of the NLCS and Yoshinobu Yamamoto in Game 2, meaning Shohei Ohtani will only pitch one game.

title: Glenn defends Fields despite Jets' -10 pass yards
content: Quarterback Justin Fields received a strong vote of confidence from coach Aaron Glenn despite the worst passing performance in Jets history.

title: Questions, takeaways from NFL Week 6: Patrick Mahomes' 4 total TDs lead Chiefs; Panthers and Chargers win thrillers
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 6.

title: The rise of Curt Cignetti, the fall of James Franklin and other midseason thoughts
content: Bill Connelly looks at both ends of the coaching world, plus the top players, the Heisman race and more.

title: Penn State fires James Franklin: Top candidates, transfers and recruits
content: After two shocking losses, Penn State is looking for a new coach. The job quickly becomes the best in this cycle.

title: Week 6 winners and losers: Dowdle makes case to keep starting; time to sack Fields?
content: Rico Dowdle, Jaxon Smith-Njigba and De'Von Achane dazzled with big Week 6 performances, but several of fantasy's most reliable stars early this season had a down week.

title: Buzz: Dowdle stars again with 239 yards; Is Hubbard's starting job in jeopardy?
content: A look at what stood out from Sunday, including Rico Dowdle potentially shaking up Carolina's RB depth chart.

title: Who is going to the World Series? Expert predictions for ALCS, NLCS
content: The Dodgers, Brewers, Blue Jays and Mariners remain. Here's who we think will move on -- and how our playoff predictions have fared so far.

title: Latest matchups for every postseason game, from Celebration Bowl to national title
content: Texas A&M, Texas Tech, Georgia Tech -- and, of course, Indiana -- continue to surprise in the bowl picture.

title: Hamlin charges to emotional 60th Cup win
content: Denny Hamlin became the first driver to lock in a spot in NASCAR's championship-deciding finale, winning Sunday at Las Vegas Motor Speedway for his career-goal 60th Cup Series triumph.

title: Who is this year's Mr. October? Tracking the playoff leaders so far
content: We go inside the numbers to keep tabs on which players are doing the best job at helping their teams win.

title: Tuchel's tough love on Bellingham could help England and the player at World Cup
content: England boss Thomas Tuchel wants unity, humility and hunger, even if it means sidelining his biggest name -- Jude Bellingham -- for now.

title: NWSL Power Rankings: Chawinga eyes Golden Boot with record-setting Current
content: Record-setting Kansas City is soaring into the postseason off the back of Temwa Chawinga's goals. That and more in ESPN's NWSL Power Rankings.

title: Jaguars WR Travis Hunter takes part in life-changing event before Seahawks matchup
content: The Jacksonville Jaguars' two-way rookie took part in the life-changing decision at Celebration Church.

title: NFL draft risers, questions and notes: What did we learn about the QB class Saturday?
content: Has anyone emerged as the 2026 draft class' QB1 yet? We have notes and updates on NFL prospects through CFB Week 7.

title: The Broncos are a defensive-based team, and that's what they need to be right now
content: Sean Payton is known for his great offenses. But after another big day on the other side of the ball, he knows Denver has a defensive personality.

title: Patriots win third straight game thanks to Kayshon Boutte's big day
content: The WR had two TDs in a return to his home state. Now, New England is on to another homecoming in Tennessee.

title: Bettors back Bengals; Beck, Simpson, Mendoza new Heisman faves; Mayfield for MVP?
content: In Joe Flacco's debut with Cincinnati, the underdog Bengals attracted betting support then covered late vs. the Green Bay Packers.

title: Offseason questions for eliminated teams: What's next for Cubs after NLDS defeat
content: Here's how the winter looks in Chicago -- and in the other towns whose teams lost their final postseason game.

title: The three stars who made the Aces three-time WNBA champs
content: Las Vegas won on the shoulders of A'ja Wilson, Chelsea Gray and Jackie Young. The trio has no plans to stop.

title: Once a club on the rise, Liverpool in desperate need of a spark under Gareth Taylor
content: Gareth Taylor had a chance to rewrite the narrative of Liverpool's season against Manchester City, his former club. Instead, the Reds fell short once again.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid targeting Chelsea's Enzo Fernández
content: Real Madrid are strengthening their pursuit of Chelsea's Enzo Fernández. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Tiger Woods injuries: Timeline of some of the injuries from Tiger's career
content: From 2007 to now, Tiger Woods has had a number of serious injuries. Here's a look at some of the more impactful ones, starting with an ACL and ending with a ruptured Achilles tendon.

title: Cheat sheet: 2025-26 NBA player rankings, schedule grid, more
content: Here is all of our key fantasy basketball draft content -- rankings, sleepers, schedule grid and draft tips -- collected into downloadable/printable PDF cheat sheets.

title: Amoebic infection confirmed in three-year-old boy in Kerala’s Kannur
content: Lab analysis of cerebrospinal fluid samples confirms presence of amoeba species, raising concerns of amoebic meningoencephalitis. The child’s condition is reported to be stable

title: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy, Ministers condole death of Konda Lakshma Reddy
content: Chief Minister Revanth Reddy also lauded his services as a legislator and his leadership roles as president of the Hyderabad Press Club and the Jubilee Hills Journalists’ Cooperative Housing Society

title: Foxconn leadership meets CM Stalin, to invest ₹15,000 crore in Tamil Nadu
content: The company also announced the creation of 14,000 engineering jobs and a dedicated Foxconn Desk at Guidance, the State’s nodal agency for investment promotion

title: IRCTC case: Court frames charges against Lalu, Rabri and Tejashwi
content: Common charges of criminal conspiracy and cheating were framed against RJD leaders Rabri Devi and Tejashwi Yadav in the case

title: Supreme Court issues notice to Centre, Kerala, T.N., NDMA on plea for new dam to replace Mullaperiyar
content: The PIL has named the Centre, the Tamil Nadu and Kerala governments and the National Disaster Management Authority as respondents

title: Tamil Nadu issues G.O. to cancel 11th standard public exam from this academic year
content: According to the G.O., starting from the academic year 2025-2026, students in the 11th standard will take their examinations following the procedure that was in place before the 2017-2018 academic year

title: Leopard kills 5-year-old girl in Pune; locals seek protection
content: Tragic leopard attack in Maharashtra claims the life of a 5-year-old girl, sparking calls for stronger preventive measures

title: Supreme Court orders CBI probe into Karur stampede, constitutes 3-member panel to monitor investigation
content: A Bench headed by Justice J.K. Maheswari sets up a three-member supervisory committee, headed by its retired judge Justice Ajay Rastogi to monitor the probe

title: 36 held in Mizoram for Inner Line Permit violation
content: The individuals were found with either expired the Inner Line Permit or not possessing the travel permit

title: Former Chevella MLA and NSS MD Konda Lakshma Reddy passes away
content: Lakshma Reddy began his political journey with the Congress and remained loyal to the party throughout his career

title: Land for jobs scam case: Delhi court frames charges against Lalu Prasad, Rabri Devi and Tejashwi Yadav
content: RJD leaders Rabri Devi and Tejashwi Yadav have also been charged with cheating and criminal conspiracy in the case

title: Cough syrup deaths: ED conducts searches at seven locations in T.N. after arrest of Sresan Pharma proprietor
content: Searches are also being conducted at the residence of P.U. Karthikeyan, former Joint Director of Drugs Control, Food and Drug Administration

title: Two militants arrested in Manipur, arms and ammunition seized
content: One active cadre of the proscribed Kanglei Yawol Kanna Lup was arrested from Uchon Awag Leikai in Imphal East district, says police

title: Bihar Assembly polls: Decks cleared for CPI(ML) Liberation to contest 18 seats, talks on for few more: Dipankar
content: Dipankar Bhattacharya slammed the voter roll deletions under the Election Commission's special intensive revision (SIR) as an "electoral purge masquerading as verification"

title: Govt-appointed expert panel finds Bengaluru tunnel road DPR ‘rushed’, Lalbagh shaft and metro overlap major flaws
content: The committee also pointed out that the DPR considered a ‘horizon year’ (future year for which traffic projections are made) of 2041, which is just 10 years after the project’s expected completion, instead of the standard 25-year period required for such infrastructure projects

title: Ladakh desperately awaits healing touch, BJP refusing to fulfil Sixth Schedule promise: Congress
content: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh made the assertion ahead of Mongolian President Khurelsukh Ukhnaa's visit to India

title: Bihar Assembly polls: Jan Suraaj to release its second list of candidates, may end Raghopur suspense
content: All eyes are on Raghopur seat, in Vaishali district, where sitting MLA Tejashwi Yadav aims for a hat-trick

title: SC hearing on Karur stampede LIVE: SC transfers probe to CBI, forms panel led by former SC judge to oversee investigation
content: Supreme Court constitutes a three-member committee headed by former Supreme Court Judge Justice Ajay Rastogi to oversee the probe

title: ‘Her life’s in danger’: Rape survivor’s father appeals to government to shift daughter to Bhubaneswar
content: The survivor, a second-year MBBS student, is currently undergoing treatment at a hospital in Durgapur

title: Delay in constructing pedestrian bridge near Challaghatta metro station in Bengaluru puts commuters at risk
content: In April 2024, BMRCL had unveiled plans to construct a pedestrian bridge across the Bengaluru-Mysuru highway to ease movement of people between the two sides and ensure safer access to the metro station

title: Fire erupts at several auto parts shops in Mumbai; no casualty
content: The fire was confined to stocks of automobile spare parts, electric wiring and installations, tyres, and scrap material

title: The voting patterns of Muslims in Seemanchal
content: Muslims in Seemanchal are broadly divided into three castes — the Surjapuri, Shershahbadi and Kulhaiya castes. Although the differences between them are not very obvious to an outsider, these three caste groups differ culturally

title: Vizag will become State’s financial capital, says IT Minister Lokesh
content: It has taken 30 years for Hyderabad to develop, but Visakhapatnamwill not take more than10 years, he asserts, and insists that the city will be a trillion dollar economy by 2047

title: Bihar election LIVE: Jan Suraaj to release its second list of candidates, may end Raghopur suspense
content: The Mahagathbandhan (grand alliance) leaders will meet in Delhi to finalise the seat-sharing deal for the Bihar Assembly election on Monday

title: Residents, activists raise questions over renaming of streets in Chennai
content: Activists say that it would be time consuming to change addresses on various identity cards; many queries are yet to be answered, they say

title: Congress alleges government of increasingly restricting citizens’ access to RTI in Tripura
content: Saha told presspersons that the BJP govt has increasingly restricted citizens’ access to information over the past 11 years and also undermined the effectiveness of Right to Information Commissions at the State level.

title: India to host U.N. troop contributing countries' chiefs conclave from Oct 14-16
content: The UNTCC serves as a vital forum to address operational challenges, evolving threats, interoperability, inclusivity in decision-making and the role of technology and training in strengthening UN peacekeeping.

title: Gurugram gets India’s first QR-based challan payment kiosk
content: Each unit will be equipped with beacon lights for visibility, and allow citizens to connect via video call to report emergencies or request help at the press of a button.

title: Death of 3 minors in a month rattles Meghalaya
content: A juvenile was held after the mysterious death of a four-year-old girl in Shillong, while a 22-year-old man was arrested for the alleged rape and murder of a 13-year-old girl in the Ri-Bhoi district

title: Congress reaches out to alliance partners over Bills to remove PM, CMs, Ministers
content: The three Bills deal with the procedure to remove the Prime Minister, Chief Ministers, and Ministers if they are arrested on serious criminal charges for 30 days

title: Haryana IPS officer death: Stalemate over autopsy continues; 48-hour ultimatum to remove DGP
content: The officer's family has refused to give its consent for a post-mortem examination and cremation of the body until its demands are addressed.

title: T.N. Minister inaugurates Fire and Rescue station for Arunachaleswarar temple
content: TNFRS officials said that it was a fire accident that gutted over 30 shops along the East Tower side of the Sri Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple in Madurai in February 2018 that mooted the idea of setting up fire and rescue stations meant exclusively for historical temples in the State.

title: CSIR- SERC develops technology to reduce construction time; demonstrates indigenous Threaded End Anchor system
content: This anchor system addresses one of the long – time challenges in reinforced concrete construction, which is reinforcement congestion, and the resultant need for lengthy anchorage requirements.

title: Vijayawada’s first heritage walk evokes good response
content: The participants, especially the younger lot, listened in attention as INTACH volunteers explained to them about the significance of each site

title: Karur stampede case: DMK sees bid to mislead Supreme Court
content: One petition seems to have been filed in the name of a person not truly representative of the deceased and the other by a person who seems to have been misled into signing documents he did not fully understand, says DMK organisation secretary R.S. Bharathi

title: Great Amaravati Shopping Festival a perfect platform to cash in on GST reforms, says Collector
content: Being organised from October 13 to 19 at Punnami Ghat-Berm Park in Vijayawada, the festival offers businesses, budding entrepreneurs, and artisans to set up stalls and promote their brands, says Lakshmisha

title: Pact with Google on Vizag data centre will be signed in Delhi on October 14, says Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: The 1 GW facility will transform the Port City into a global data hub and give a fillip to the government’s initiatives in Artificial Intelligence

title: Environment Minister heads to Brazil for key pre-COP talks
content: COP30 is set to take place against a complex geopolitical backdrop, with the United States withdrawing from the Paris Agreement and several developed countries reassessing their climate strategies

title: Haryana Cabinet approves ordinance to decriminalise minor offences
content: The ordinance replaces criminal penalties for minor technical and procedural lapses with civil penalties and administrative actions

title: Canadian Foreign Minister Anita Anand arrives in Delhi, set to meet Jaishankar on October 13
content: In New Delhi, Minister Anand will meet with Mr. Jaishankar and Mr. Goyal, as “both countries move toward establishing a framework for strategic cooperation

title: Operation Blue Star: BJP, SGPC take dig at Congress after Chidambaram remarks
content: BJP spokesperson R.P. Singh says the operation was completely avoidable, as rightly mentioned by former Home Minister Chidambaram

title: Man forced to wash Brahmin man’s feet, drink water over ‘objectionable’ AI image in Madhya Pradesh, four booked
content: A video of the alleged incident has also appeared on social media showing the victim surrounded by locals, who were instructing him to perform the act and apologise, washing a man’s feet

title: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister rolls out Excise Suraksha app, sets up SIT
content: The app enables consumers to check liquor quality, while a Special Investigation Team investigates the Mulakalacheruvu spurious liquor racket

title: Lack of dog catchers hits district panchayat’s sterilisation programme
content: Despite having the capacity to sterilise over 100 dogs every month, the two ABC centres in Mulanthuruthy and Vadavucode block panchayats are unable to meet the target

title: Grand alliance to finalise Bihar seat-sharing on October 13; Rahul Gandhi may meet Tejashwi
content: Vikassheel Insaan Party chief Mukesh Sahani says the alliance is “unwell” and that all the “doctors” are sitting in Delhi; Congress says it will fight on a “respectable and acceptable” number of seats

title: National and strategic interests are supreme, says Saharanpur MP Imran Masood
content: The Congress leader’s remarks follow a visit by the Afghan Taliban administration’s Foreign Minister Amir Khan Muttaqi to the Darul Uloom Deoband in Saharanpur

title: Email accounts of 12 lakh Central government employees now run on Zoho’s platform
content: The accounts were migrated from a National Informatics Centre-based system; senior official says Zoho’s suite has been activated to ensure that government employees do not use open source applications; the move to switch to Zoho’s platform ‘empowers India to lead with home-grown innovation’, the Centre says

title: CPI(M), Congress likely to seek more seats in Tamil Nadu in 2026
content: We have identified the constituencies where we will campaign. Other parties are carrying out a State-wide campaign to come to power. But we contest only in a few constituencies as part of an alliance. So, there is no need for a State-wide campaign for us, says the party State secretary

title: Man from Tamil Nadu gets new lease of life at Kozhikode MCH
content: Prashanth, 32, of Tirupathur met with a road accident in Kozhikode while travelling to Sabarimala from Kannur

title: Sharmila accuses NDA government of weakening RTI Act on its 20th anniversary
content: She demands repeal of 2019 amendments, restoration of tenure and autonomy for Information Commissions

title: Mahatma Gandhi’s method remains profoundly relevant today: Bhikhu Parekh
content: Gandhiji reminds us to look through another’s eyes, says the member of the House of Lords in the U.K. and a political thinker; he says the recognition of the state of Palestine by Britain gives symbolic legitimacy but imposes no real obligations; he describes Prime Minister Narendra Modi as capable and competent, but greatness requires more, especially in addressing India’s structural flaws.

title: Tej Pratap Yadav unfollows Tejashwi Yadav on ‘X’, signalling widening RJD family rift
content: Ahead of Bihar Assembly elections, the elder Yadav scion distances himself from his younger brother and the party leadership, while forging alliances for his new political venture

title: Will not discuss alliance expectations in public: Selvaperunthagai
content: He says he will communicate State unit’s expectations to the All India Congress Committee and the DMK leadership

title: Suresh Gopi offers to step down as Minister, wants C. Sadanandan to replace him
content: “I never wanted to be a Minister by quitting my film career,” Suresh Gopi said, adding that his income had significantly decreased in recent times

title: Attack on Telugu devotee in Tiruvannamalai sparks concern in Tirupati
content: Political analysts and social activists warn that rising Tamil‑Telugu tensions could strain inter‑State relations and local trade, urging that temples stay above politics

title: Commuters demand urgent repair of Hennur–Bagalur road linking Bengaluru airport
content: Commuters have argued that if repaired properly, the road could serve airport-bound traffic by cutting down travel time, fuel consumption, and congestion on the main highway leading to the airport

title: Government to file SLP in the Supreme Court over over 42% BC quota in local body polls
content: The government is confident that it has complied with all the conditions laid down by the Supreme Court in earlier judgments concerning reservations for BCs in local bodies

title: We are not building palaces, but bringing investments, says Andhra Pradesh IT Minister Lokesh
content: Defending allocation of prime land for IT giants for a low price, he says, of the investment agreements worth approximately 120 billion dollars signed so far, nearly 50% are focused on the Greater Visakhapatnam Economic Region

title: SIT probe into ‘misappropriation’ of Sabarimala Ayyappa temple artefacts expands to other States
content: A squad is in Chennai to interview the factory management contracted by Unnikrishnan Potti, the prime accused, to restore the gold-plated panels. Officials say the SIT may probe Potti’s antecedents in Bengaluru and Hyderabad.

title: Israeli Hostages Freed By Hamas After 2 Years, Massive Cheers In Tel Aviv
content: Hamas has released seven Israeli hostages into the custody of the Red Cross, the first batch to be released as part of the US-backed ceasefire deal. There was no immediate information on their condition.

title: Malaysian Businessman Attacked In London, Says Wife Fought Like "Lioness"
content: A police constable told Vinod Sekhar that he was fortunate and that he could have gotten injured had he not surrendered his possessions.

title: Israel-Hamas Ceasefire LIVE Updates: 'Hamas Hands Over First 7 Hostages To Red Cross As Part Of Gaza Peace Deal': Israel
content: Israel Gaza Ceasefire LIVE Updates: Hamas released seven hostages into the custody of the Red Cross on Monday, the first to be released as part of a ceasefire in the Israel-Hamas war. There was no immediate information on their condition.

title: YouTuber, Son Arrested For Raping Minor In Bengal
content: A YouTuber and his minor son have been arrested by the Kolkata police for allegedly raping a minor girl after blackmailing her by taking her private photos in the guise of making objectionable videos and reels on the social media, the police said on

title: Vijay's Aide Arrested Over Derogatory Remarks Against Madras High Court Judge
content: The TVK leader had allegedly posted derogatory remarks and a photograph on social media critical of the Judge's observations regarding the Karur stampede.

title: Exclusive: Gang-Rape Survivor's Father Responds To Mamata Banerjee Shocker
content: The father of the MBBS student gangraped near a medical college in West Bengal's Durgapur has slammed Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee's remarks on women stepping out of college campuses late at night.

title: Kerala High Court Dismisses Plea Against Arundhati Roy's Book Cover
content: The Kerala High Court on Monday dismissed a Public Interest Litigation (PIL) filed against author Arundhati Roy's book 'Mother Mary Comes To Me' over its cover image showing the writer smoking.

title: Trump Says Will Restore Merit-Based Education, Eliminate Anti-American Ideology
content: US President Donald Trump has vowed to eliminate what he describes as "woke, socialist, and anti-American ideology" from US college campuses and restore merit and hard work-based education.

title: "War In Gaza Is Over": Trump As Israel, Hamas Swap Hostages, Prisoners
content: The Israeli Defence Forces (IDF) have launched an Operation 'Returning Home' - aimed at bringing back hostages held by Hamas.

title: "Incident Shook The Nation": Supreme Court Orders CBI Probe In Karur Stampede
content: A three-member committee headed by a retired Supreme Court judge will oversee the probe into the stampede during TVK chief Vijay's rally last month.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Indians Are Loving Their Music Concerts ... But Not Their Venues
content: Facilities the world over are renovating themselves to host sporting and live entertainment events. The country that built cricket stadiums to dazzle the world, needs world-class music venues.

title: These 20 Israeli Hostages Are Being Released From Captivity In Gaza
content: Twenty living Israeli hostages are expected to be released from captivity in Gaza on Monday under a ceasefire deal with Hamas.

title: On Camera, Bengaluru Bus Rams 9 Vehicles After Driver Suffers Seizure
content: A Bengaluru Metropolitan Transport Corporation (BMTC) bus went out of control near Chinnaswamy Stadium, crashing into nine vehicles, including three autorickshaws, three cars, and several two-wheelers.

title: No Chief Minister, Gang-Raped Student Didn't Leave Campus At 12.30 am
content: The 23-year-old MBBS student gangraped near a medical college in West Bengal's Durgapur did not leave the campus at midnight, as suggested by Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee.

title: Tata Sons Chairman N Chandrasekaran's Tenure Extended By Tata Trusts
content: N Chandrasekaran will continue as the Chairman of Tata Sons till 2032, NDTV Profit has learned. The decision marks a break from the company's existing retirement policy, which direct that executives retire at the age of 65.

title: Probe Agency ED Raids Premises Linked To Firm Behind 'Killer' Cough Syrup
content: The 'Coldrif' cough syrup was found to be "dangerously" adulterated with diethylene glycol (DEG), a highly poisonous substance.

title: 'Threatened 200% Tariffs': Trump Doubles Down On India-Pak Truce Claim
content: US President Donald Trump has touted his tariff threats as the real peacemaker between India and Pakistan during the military conflict earlier this year.

title: YouTube Warns Australia Social Media Ban Won't Keep Children Safe
content: Australia's push to ban children from social media is "well intentioned" but will not make them safer online, video streaming giant YouTube warned on Monday.

title: France Unveils New Government Led By Same PM Amid Political Crisis
content: France has been mired in political crisis ever since Macron last year called snap polls, intending to consolidate his power but ending up instead with a hung parliament and gains for the far right.

title: Joyful reunion: 7 hostages return from Hamas captivity
content: Seven hostages held by Hamas for over two years have returned safely to Israel. They reunited with their families in emotional scenes. The hostages were escorted by Israeli forces from Gaza. This release is a significant milestone in the Gaza ceasefire efforts. It brings hope to families affected by the conflict. The operation was named 'Operation Returning Home'.

title: Bengaluru rides turn risky: Businessman slapped, influencer trapped, passenger abused
content: Bengaluru commuters face alarming safety issues. A businessman was assaulted for questioning a toll detour, a call centre employee was attacked after cancelling an auto ride, and a social media influencer was trapped during an Uber trip. These incidents highlight growing concerns for passenger security on city roads.

title: Welfare hangs in balance: Tribal women tie phones to trees for Ladkhi Bahin OTP
content: Tribal women in Maharashtra's Nandurbar district face immense challenges accessing government aid, trekking miles to find weak mobile signals for e-KYC verification for the Ladki Bahin Yojana. Despite the state mandating digital processes, patchy networks and technical glitches leave many struggling to receive their monthly payouts, highlighting a stark digital divide.

title: Tech crash: Trump’s China tariffs causes $770 bn wipeout from Amazon, Nvidia, Tesla
content: Tech giants like Amazon, Nvidia, and Tesla faced a massive $770 billion market value drop following President Trump's threat of 100% tariffs on China and export controls.  This significant market downturn, the worst since April, also impacted the Nasdaq and S&P 500, with Bitcoin experiencing a sharp decline as well.

title: Countering China curbs: India plans rare earths stockpile; 2 months of stores planned
content: India is establishing a National Critical Mineral Stockpile to secure rare earth elements, crucial for green technologies, following China's export curbs. The program aims for a two-month reserve, encouraging private sector involvement.

title: Ranji Trophy: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi adds new feather to his cap; named Bihar's vice-captain
content: Bihar Cricket Association has appointed 14-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi as vice-captain for the upcoming Ranji Trophy season. Suryavanshi, a prodigious talent with an IPL century and youth international achievements, makes his debut alongside captain Sakibul Gani. Bihar aims to bounce back after relegation to the Plate League.

title: Hyderabad: 10-year-old 'sexually assaulted' for months by supervisor at govt shelter
content: A 10-year-old boy at a Hyderabad children's home was allegedly sexually assaulted by a supervisor on multiple occasions since May. The victim disclosed the abuse to his mother during a recent visit. Police have registered a case under the POCSO Act and taken the supervisor into custody for further investigation.

title: Microsoft engineer quits after 13 years; sends resignation email to employees
content: A principal software engineer at Microsoft resigned, citing the company's cloud services contracts with the Israeli military. This follows months of internal dissent and the firing of five employees over Gaza-related protests. While Microsoft cut some services to an Israeli intelligence unit, activists argue it's insufficient.

title: 'We’ve been waiting': Netanyahu, wife pen personal note for hostages
content: Israel welcomed home seven returning hostages handed over to the Red Cross in Gaza, with an additional 14 expected later. Prime Minister Netanyahu and his wife sent a personal message of embrace. The release is part of a deal involving Palestinian prisoner exchanges and aid delivery to Gaza.

title: Sara Tendulkar's b'day: Saaniya and Arjun celebrate; share unseen pictures
content: Sara Tendulkar celebrated her 28th birthday with heartfelt wishes from family and friends, including her brother Arjun and his fiancée Saaniya Chandhok. Sachin Tendulkar also shared warm wishes to his daughter. The celebrations offered a personal glimpse into the lives of the renowned cricketing family, with social media abuzz with heartfelt messages and shared memories.

title: IRCTC 'scam': Delhi court frames charges against Lalu, Rabri, Tejashwi & others
content: A Delhi court has framed charges against former Railway Minister Lalu Prasad Yadav, Rabri Devi, Tejashwi Yadav, and others in the IRCTC hotels corruption case. The allegations involve corruption in the tender of two IRCTC hotels in Ranchi and Puri, with the CBI claiming Yadav received prime land in return for the contract awarded to Sujata Hotel.

title: ‘Much like Apple has…’: Musk again targets Microsoft on X over AI-automation
content: Elon Musk's xAI is developing 'Macrohard,' a satirical AI-driven software company aiming to automate development at scale.  This ambitious project, confirmed by Musk and evidenced by a trademark filing, seeks to simulate tech giants like Microsoft entirely through AI agents, handling tasks from coding to design without human intervention.

title: MTV to shut down music channels: Why the network is closing its iconic music channels
content: MTV is set to close five of its iconic music channels, including MTV Music, MTV 80s, MTV 90s, Club MTV, and MTV Live, by December 31, 2025. This decision, driven by changing viewing habits and cost-cutting measures, marks the end of an era for music television. The brand will continue its presence on social media and the Paramount+ streaming service.

title: 'Fair investigation citizens' right': SC orders CBI probe into Karur stampede
content: The Supreme Court has ordered the CBI to investigate the stampede at a rally in Tamil Nadu, appointing a retired judge to supervise the probe. The court emphasized that a fair investigation is a citizen's right, despite claims from the state government about the petition's origin. An NDA fact-finding team deemed the tragedy preventable due to negligence.

title: Over 33L students taught in 1 lakh single-teacher schools: Andhra tops in count
content: Over 33 lakh students in India attend 1,04,125 single-teacher schools, with Andhra Pradesh having the most such schools and Uttar Pradesh the highest enrolments. Despite a 6% decline in single-teacher schools, disparities persist in student-teacher ratios. Government measures like school rationalisation and teacher redeployment aim to optimise resources and improve learning outcomes across regions.

title: Justin Trudeau dating Katy Perry - a brief history of power couples
content: When politics falls in love with pop, the result isn’t a romance. It’s a referendum on power, spectacle, and how we worship both.

title: MP shocker: Youth made to wash feet, drink water as 'punishment'
content: In Damoh, Madhya Pradesh, a young man faced public humiliation at a village panchayat for an AI-generated meme. He was allegedly forced to wash and drink water from the feet of another man as punishment. The incident, captured on video and widely shared, has prompted police to file a case against six individuals.

title: 'CM lied': BJP counters Mamata’s '12:30 am' remark; calls 8pm 'decent hour'
content: The BJP has accused Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee of misrepresenting facts regarding a medical student's gang-rape in Durgapur. While the college states the victim left at 8 p.m. for food, Banerjee claimed 12:30 a.m., a discrepancy the BJP uses to highlight alleged police negligence and a breakdown in law and order. Three arrests have been made.

title: Hyderabad shocker: Woman kills drunk husband in front of 12-year-old son
content: A woman in Keshampet allegedly killed her husband with a brick after he returned home drunk and harassed her. Despite their 12-year-old son's pleas, the wife repeatedly struck the victim, then disposed of his body. Police have registered a murder case and are searching for the accused.

title: First in 23 years: WI opener Campbell scripts history against IND; hits ton
content: West Indies opener John Campbell scored a composed maiden Test century against India in Delhi, a significant achievement marking the first by a West Indies opener in India in 23 years. His resilient 115-run innings, featuring 12 fours and 3 sixes, provided a bright spot for the visitors despite India's dominance in the series.

title: Gold price prediction: What's the gold rate outlook for this week
content: Gold prices surged past $4,000 for the first time last week, driven by geopolitical tensions and a weakening dollar. Despite a mid-week pullback due to a dollar rebound and eased fears, analysts suggest buying on dips. Key US economic data and Fed speeches will be closely watched, alongside global geopolitical developments.

title: Pak claims over 200 Taliban forces killed in clash; claims Afghanistan facilitating ‘terror infra’
content: Pakistan and Taliban-ruled Afghanistan are locked in intense border clashes along the Durand Line. Pakistan claims to have killed over 200 Taliban fighters in self-defense after responding to attacks. Islamabad also warned of a strong response to further provocations, while accusing Kabul of diverting attention from terrorist elements within Afghanistan.

title: When is Diwali 2025 being celebrated across India, on October 20 or 21?
content: Diwali 2025 is on October 20. The Amavasya Tithi begins on October 20 and ends on October 21. Lakshmi Puja is scheduled between 7:08 PM and 8:18 PM. This festival signifies the victory of light over darkness. Homes will be decorated, and families will gather to celebrate prosperity and togetherness. The festival emphasizes renewal and gratitude.

title: 'Viewers made this possible': US vlogger buys new cycle for Indian kid - watch video
content: A US vlogger, @jaystreazy, gifted a new bicycle to an Indian boy named Samarth, a gesture made possible by his viewers. The heartwarming video shows Samarth choosing a bike worth Rs 24,000 after the vlogger explained it was a collective gift from fans who saw his old, broken bicycle. The vlogger also ensured to get parental consent before the purchase.

title: IND vs WI | Bumrah’s shocking remark to umpire: 'It's out, but can't prove it'
content: A dramatic LBW appeal against John Campbell by Jasprit Bumrah was overturned by DRS, much to the bowler's amusement. Despite a faint spike on UltraEdge, the third umpire ruled an inside edge. Campbell, batting patiently, remained unbeaten on 94, frustrating India's bowlers alongside Shai Hope's 73 at the end of 57 overs as the West Indies showed resilience.

title: Tata Capital share price: Stock lists at 1.2% premium on NSE and BSE; check details
content: Tata Capital's massive Rs 15,512 crore IPO debuted on Dalal Street today, listing at a slight premium. The non-banking financial company's offering saw strong interest from institutional investors, particularly QIBs, though retail participation was modest. Ahead of the listing, anchor investors, including LIC, injected significant capital, signaling confidence in the company's future.

title: Why Bihar’s education system needs to be on the ballot this election
content: As Bihar heads into its two-phase Assembly elections, its worsening education crisis draws urgent attention. Dropout rates at all levels—primary, secondary, and higher secondary—are among the highest in India. According to India Data Map and Counterview, teacher shortages, school closures, and poor literacy outcomes are reinforcing inequality. With over 7.43 crore voters participating, the election offers a crucial chance to make education reform a core issue shaping the state's future.

title: Encounter in UP: Wanted for multiple crimes including rape of minors, criminal shot dead
content: Notorious criminal Shehzad, wanted for rape and other crimes, was killed in an encounter with Meerut police. He opened fire during a chase after being cornered, leading to retaliatory firing by officers. A bounty of Rs 25,000 was on his head for his arrest.

title: High-flying Bihar polls: Parties turn to choppers, private jets for maximum reach
content: As Bihar's assembly elections intensify, political parties are deploying a fleet of over a dozen helicopters and chartered flights to reach voters across the state. Major parties like BJP, Congress, JD(U), and RJD have secured aerial transport for star campaigners and leaders, ensuring maximum reach and rapid movement between constituencies.

title: 'Didn't go post midnight': In gang-rape case, father counters Mamata's remark — What he said
content: The father of a 23-year-old Odia medical student contested West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee's claim about his daughter's whereabouts, stating the sexual assault occurred earlier than alleged. Odisha government officials expressed satisfaction with the West Bengal police's investigation, noting the arrest of three accused and detention of another suspect within 36 hours.

title: Coldrif cough syrup row: ED raids Sresan Pharma units in Chennai; owner in 10-day police custody
content: Enforcement Directorate raids are targeting Sresan Pharmaceuticals, the maker of a cough syrup linked to 23 child deaths in Madhya Pradesh. The company's owner, S Ranganathan, is in police custody. Investigators are examining the Kanchipuram factory, sealed by authorities, to uncover how banned diethylene glycol contaminated the syrup, exploring possibilities of adulteration or quality control failures.

title: 'Imagine, if a BJP CM ...': Rijiju on Mamata’s remark on student rape case
content: Union minister Kiren Rijiju criticized West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee's remarks on a Durgapur gangrape, calling out an "illiberal gang" for their silence. Banerjee questioned why a student was allowed to leave a campus in a "forested area" late at night, drawing parallels to a past incident. Three suspects have been arrested in the Durgapur case.

title: Filmfare Awards 2025: Nostalgia and best of Bollywood sparkle
content: The 70th Filmfare Awards in Ahmedabad celebrated Bollywood's rich history with a 'Sholay' tribute and a Shah Rukh Khan-Kajol reunion. 'Laapataa Ladies' swept major awards, including Best Film and Director for Kiran Rao. Abhishek Bachchan and Kartik Aaryan shared Best Actor, while Alia Bhatt won Best Actress. Shyam Benegal and Zeenat Aman received Lifetime Achievement honours.

title: Is Trump sticking to 100% tariffs on China plan from Nov 1? What he said
content: President Trump reaffirmed plans for 100% tariffs on Chinese imports by November 1, citing China's rare earth mineral export restrictions as a "hostile" move. While the deadline stands, Trump suggested the timeline might shift. Beijing warned of retaliation, but US officials indicated talks with China remain open, despite market jitters.

title: 2 yrs on, Gaza war may be nearing its end; Israel launches Op 'Returning Home' — Key details
content: A fragile peace deal is holding as Hamas prepares to release all surviving hostages for Palestinian prisoners. US President Donald Trump is visiting the region to bolster the ceasefire and promote his peace plan.

title: Tripura horror: 14-month-old 'raped and murdered' in Panisagar
content: A 14-month-old girl, visiting her uncle in Assam, was allegedly raped and murdered by a daily wager. The accused lured the toddler away, and her body was later found buried in a paddy field. Police arrested the suspect from Nilambazar on Sunday.

title: Karwa Chauth at station: Kanpur woman breaks fast as loco pilot husband on duty
content: A woman, Maya Kori, traveled to Kanpur Central Railway Station to break her Karwa Chauth fast with her husband, a loco pilot on duty. She performed the rituals on the platform, a moment captured on video and widely shared online, showcasing her devotion amidst the station's bustle.

title: Report: Westbrook gets big China offer amid LeBron scapegoat buzz
content: Russell Westbrook, a free agent after his time with the Denver Nuggets, is reportedly considering a massive offer from an unnamed Chinese team. This deal is rumored to be quadruple what the Sacramento Kings could have offered. The move comes after Westbrook faced scapegoating during his tenure with the Los Angeles Lakers.

title: Batter escapes gruesome injury! Bizarre incident sees ball get stuck in helmet - watch
content: West Indies all-rounder Rahkeem Cornwall had a terrifying moment in the National Cricket T10 League when a sharp bouncer struck his helmet grill, with the ball lodging dangerously close to his eye.  Thankfully, the protective gear held firm, preventing a serious injury.  Cornwall, after scoring 17, was retired out as his team fell short in the chase.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 near 25,200; BSE Sensex opens over 280 points down
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Monday. While Nifty50 was near 25,200, BSE Sensex was down over 280 points.

title: Trump’s 5% country cap: Will India’s US dream take a hit?
content: The White House proposed a funding-linked compact to elite universities, including a double cap on international undergraduates. This policy limits international students to 15% of a campus's total undergraduate body and no more than 5% from any single country. The impact on Indian families is primarily felt in undergraduate admissions, as India's US.

title: Iyer puts down trophy on floor; Rohit Sharma's priceless act goes viral - watch
content: Former India captain Rohit Sharma, appearing fitter, attended the CEAT Cricket Rating Awards. His viral moment involved respectfully placing Shreyas Iyer's award on a table, showcasing humility. Despite losing ODI captaincy, Rohit's focus remains on cricket, particularly the upcoming ODI series against Australia, signaling his continued hunger for the game.

title: Texas man who posted anti-India rant over Ganesh Chaturthi procession removed from church
content: A Texas businessman's rant against H-1B cost him dearly as he has now been removed from his gym and also from his church. He deleted the controversial post in which he said H-1Bs should be canceled as he did not want his kids to be raised in India. He made the post when he saw a Hindu religious proceeding in his area. His church asked for an apology for his sin, which he refused, as he said he won't change his stand on immigration.

title: Bengaluru businessman slapped by cab driver for questioning route change
content: A Bengaluru businessman was allegedly abused and assaulted by a cab driver for objecting to a detour to avoid a road toll. The driver was arrested by Chikkajala police after the passenger filed a complaint. The driver reportedly slapped and assaulted the passenger when confronted about the route change.

title: Way-Too-Early WNBA Power Rankings: Early look at 2026
content: the Las Vegas Aces are the 2025 champions after a WNBA Finals sweep over the Phoenix Mercury . this offseason will be the busiest in league history . a new collective bargaining agreement is needed, plus expansion drafts for two new franchises .

title: Falcons and Bills throwbacks, Commanders' all-black top NFL Week 6 threads
content: the Atlanta Falcons are rocking their throwback uniforms against the Buffalo Bills . the iconic helmet was reintroduced in 2022 with the old school Falcons logo . in the second game of a "Monday Night Football" doubleheader, the Washington Commanders are wearing their all-black alternates against a Chicago Bears game .

title: Best of Week 7: Indiana is a genuine power on the national stage
content: college football has been defined by what's new in college football . it has been nearly three decades since we've had a first-time national champion . the biggest brands have continued to dominate the sport . there's the transfer portal, NIL money, revenue sharing, revamped rosters, realignment .

title: How much longer can the Phillies keep contending?
content: the final play of the national league division series against the los Angeles Dodgers will live in your nightmares for a long time . the Phillies were eliminated in Game 4 of the NLDS . there were two other short throws from Game 2 that might have impacted the outcome of the series .

title: College football betting: Who are the top title contenders? Look to the trenches
content: the best teams in the country aren't quarterback-driven, they are line-driven . the top teams are Ohio State , Indiana , Texas Tech , Miami and Texas A&M . five of those six are undefeated .

title: WWE Crown Jewel takeaways: Cena, Styles pass the torch to Rollins, Rhodes
content: the match between two retiring legends at the end of this year and Styles in 2026 featured an impressive amount of tributes to past opponents and WWE legends . only The Undertaker has more with 107, a record we will have to wait a while to see broken .

title: Brewers or Dodgers? Blue Jays or Mariners? What final four must do to reach Fall Classic
content: the 2025 league championship series is set for a trip to the world series on the line . the next day, the defending champion Los Angeles Dodgers and top-seeded Milwaukee Brewers will begin their series on a national league side of the bracket .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12 at midseason: Buckeyes the team to beat
content: Ohio State has emerged as the clear favorite in "SportsCenter" at the midpoint of the season, Penn State has three losses . Texas is trying to claw its way back into the playoff conversation, and undefeated Indiana is a top five team . the battle for no. 1 is ongoing .

title: BJP launches counter-attack and says Congress leaders are unnerved
content: e-Paper The View From India Looking at World Affairs from the Indian perspective . first day first show news and reviews from the world of cinema and streaming . the weekly newsletter from science writers takes the jargon out of science and puts the fun in!

title: Penn State fires Franklin amid midseason free fall
content: owed more than $49 million, according to his contract . it's the second-biggest buyout in college football history behind only Jimbo Fisher's $76 million buyout from Texas A&M . no other staff changes are expected at Penn State, a source says .

title: 🤠 'So long, partner': Panthers top Week 6 trolls
content: the Panthers beat the Dallas Cowboys 30-27 after a last-second 33-yard field goal from kicker Ryan Fitzgerald . the three points capped off a 15-play, 71-yard drive from Carolina, which is 3-3 through its first six games for the first time since 2021 .

title: Time to bench Justin Fields? Let's overreact to Week 6 games, fantasy performances
content: Aaron Glenn asked if fields would remain his starting quarterback next week against Carolina . but is it an overreaction? let's tackle that and a few other fantasy football topics at the bottom . fields was 9-for-17 for 45 passing yards against the Broncos .

title: AP Week 7 poll reaction: What's next for each Top 25 team
content: the top two teams in the poll stayed steady but there was movement not far below . then-no. 7 Indiana went to then no. 3 Oregon and notched a big win to declare themselves as legitimate national title contenders . Alabama and Ole Miss squeaked out wins . now they are atop the SEC alongside Texas A&M .

title: Pakistan fumes as Taliban back India’s sovereignty over J&K
content: the Taliban have backed India’s sovereignty over Jammu & Kashmir (J&K) the joint statement was issued after external affairs minister S Jaishankar’s meeting with Afghan foreign minister Amir Khan Muttaqi . Pakistan sees Afghanistan as opening a new front in the strained relationship .
